name: 4:Loop
summary: Created by Mike Booth and the interactive storytellers at Bad Robot Games, 4:LOOP is a tactical, four-player co-op shooter crafted for endless replayability and infinite ways to build the ultimate team. Together, if you can learn from your mistakes, you might just fail to save the world.

name: 4 Leaf Clovers
summary: An edutainment game with a few stories revolving around a group of animal friends living together in a house, along with a plethora of minigames

name: 4-Lung Boy
summary:
A week after moving to a small town, you are confronted by frustration, an astronaut, and striped siblings...

4-Lung Boy is a short point & click adventure story, designed and illustrated by Anatola Howard (maroonracoon) & put into motion by denzquix

name: 4-Legged Heroine
summary: A short-game by Sergio 'Trac' Eslava & Wolfgang Aktion

name: 4Line
summary: 4Line is a real-time take on the classic 4 in a Row board game. Play in fast-paced 1-minute matches, trying to get 4 in a row before your opponent does. Collect gems on the board to speed up your gameplay and gain an edge on your opponent.

name: 4 Letters 1 Word
summary:
4 Letters 1 Word is the endless four letters combination word puzzle game.
We give you four letters, and you make a word as quickly as you can. Once time runs out, have another go! Keep making words to increase your score.
